message.body: Hi:) u around today? Would u wanna ride Titan? Both Jill n I are busy.
Hey, I'm around and I'll be happy to ride him, thanks!
Sure thing. Also, looks like it's gonna be stormy tomorrow, but I still wanna go to the horse park sometime!
Yes me too!! It's gonna be nice n warm tomorrow but scattered showers/storms... Maybe we could squeeze a ride in??
So I'm supposed to do Mother's Day stuff tomorrow afternoon...but I'd kind of rather go ride?? Let's keep an eye on the weather, maybe we can go in the morning?
Hey sorry I didn't text back last night. I forgot that Jill is going to school tomorrow at burgany hollow so ill prob just come to the farm n ride... If u wanna go for a ride in the orchard I could:)
No problem, let's try again next weekend! Orchard sounds good, what time do you think?
